hero.name: Jean Dupont

about.title: About me
about.description: Passionate about web development for over 5 years, I combine creativity and technical expertise to create innovative digital solutions. My approach is user-centered, with a constant focus on quality and performance.

dynamicMappingGenerator.description: Interactive tool based on D3.js to visualize tasks, decisions, and actors in a collaborative process. Fully editable with drag & drop.
